name: Escape From the Poison Forest (Deyu)
description:
Escape from the Poison Forest

You are a brave adventurer who gets lost in a forest full of poisonous fog.  Try your best to get out of here!!! 

You will get hurt every 10 seconds, and you have a maximum amount of three health points. Find the healing heart to restore your health points.

 Beat the monsters appearing on your escape path, but some of them are stronger than you. Perform like a mature adventurer, and develop your own strategies through repetition and failures.

There are totally three levels in this game. You need to collect a certain amount of keys to enter the next level at the flag point. Use your time wisely. Your every single move, your every single second, is priceless.

Control

Use A and D to move left and right. Press space for jumping. You are armed with a magic gun. Aim monsters with your mouse and press the left mouse button to kill them. Press button P to pause the game when you need to leave your computer. Otherwise, you die in  30 seconds.
